post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Consultant - Toronto

  FAME specializes in the delivery of historical data management products and services for the world's financial, energy, and public sector markets. Recognized industry-wide as a leader in time-series data management for quantitative and economic analysts and risk management and research professionals since 1982, we have provided the financial sector with a powerful database management system for data storage, retrieval, analysis and distribution.

FAME is currently looking for an exceptional software developer with good communication skills and experience in the financial industry to work in a fast-paced, dynamic and challenging environment.

Requirements:
Applicants for this position should possess the following qualifications:

- A degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, Engineering, Finance or Economics
- Full life cycle development experience
- Object-oriented design and development experience in Java and C++ on UNIX & Windows platforms
- Database design (Sybase or Oracle) experience
- Perl and other UNIX shell scripting experience
- Experience in the financial industry
- Good communication skills - verbal & written
- Ability to get up to speed quickly in a changing technical environment

Following will be a definite plus:

- Object-oriented analysis and design expertise using UML and Rational Rose

If you wish to pursue a career with us, please contact Email: klila@fame.com

Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Employee  


Contact Information
klila@fame.com
FAME Information Services, Inc.
post.title: GTA-Consultant - Toronto
